message.content:
**1) Analyzing the Main Target Image**

There are **two separate structures**:

• **Left “Tower” (8 total blocks, 5 layers):**  
  – **Bottom layer**: a yellow rectangular beam.  
  – **Second layer**: two tall green rectangular prisms side by side (forming columns).  
  – **Third layer**: another yellow rectangular beam spanning across the two green columns.  
  – **Fourth layer**: two orange cylinders stacked on top of the middle beam (aligned with the green columns below).  
  – **Fifth layer**: a third yellow rectangular beam on top of the orange cylinders, and finally an orange wedge‐shaped block forming the “roof.”  

• **Right “Arch‐and‐Circle” Structure (6 total blocks, 5 layers):**  
  – **Bottom layer**: a red arch block (arch opening facing upward).  
  – **Second layer**: a short green rectangular block resting on top of the arch.  
  – **Third layer**: two yellow half‐cylinders, side by side, creating a full circular shape when viewed from the front.  
  – **Fourth layer**: another short green rectangular block on top of the half‐cylinders.  
  – **Fifth layer**: a second red arch block (arch opening facing downward), capping the structure.  

**2) Selecting the Required Blocks from the Dictionary**

Matching each shape (including color and orientation exactly as shown, without rotation):

• **Left Tower:**  
  – 3 × (Block #7) – Yellow rectangular beams (used horizontally)  
  – 2 × (Block #6) – Tall green rectangular prisms (used vertically)  
  – 2 × (Block #9) – Orange cylinders (vertical)  
  – 1 × (Block #16) – Orange wedge (roof piece)  

• **Right Structure:**  
  – 1 × (Block #1) – Red arch with its arch opening “up” as in the dictionary image  
  – 2 × (Block #5) – Short green rectangular blocks (lying horizontally)  
  – 2 × (Block #11) – Yellow half‐cylinders (curved face forward/back)  
  – 1 × (Block #2) – Red arch with its arch opening “down” as in the dictionary image  

**3) Assembly Order**

Below is one possible bottom‐to‐top assembly sequence (14 steps total):

{
  Step1: Move block with index 7   (bottom yellow beam of left tower)  
  Step2: Move block with index 6   (left green column)  
  Step3: Move block with index 6   (right green column)  
  Step4: Move block with index 7   (middle yellow beam)  
  Step5: Move block with index 9   (left orange cylinder)  
  Step6: Move block with index 9   (right orange cylinder)  
  Step7: Move block with index 7   (top yellow beam)  
  Step8: Move block with index 16  (orange wedge roof)  
  Step9: Move block with index 1   (bottom red arch of right structure)  
  Step10: Move block with index 5  (first green rectangular block)  
  Step11: Move block with index 11 (left yellow half‐cylinder)  
  Step12: Move block with index 11 (right yellow half‐cylinder)  
  Step13: Move block with index 5  (second green rectangular block)  
  Step14: Move block with index 2  (top red arch)  
}
